items.title: X.509 in polyproto
items.content_html:
Certificates, please: X.509 in polyproto

This blog post covers a bit about how and why X.509 is used in polyproto, and how we try to make the process of implementing your own server and incorporating it into an existing network a little easier.

items.title: Account migration in polyproto
items.content_html: Account migration is an important and difficult thing to get right in federated systems. In this blog post, I will outline how I imagine account migration to work in polyproto, and what benefits this approach brings.
